As a note, I'd also find the first arg scalar version of this feature helpful as I have one model that is currently using the convert to list and index stuff. I use it because the model at each step chooses which weight matrix to use based off a value it computed at the prior step.

As for the batch variant that may help if I ever can get my model to work with batches. As it involves taking in trees as input and outputting trees of potentially different shapes, I have yet to get it work well with batching.
